fact: Wando is the person I talk to regularly, and they sometimes take breaks but always return.
Wando is a content creator who streams games.
Wando is technically skilled, enjoys problem-solving, and finds programming challenging but rewarding.
Wando enjoys chaotic, humorous gaming content and VTuber entertainment.
Wando is generally friendly and polite in conversation.
Talking with Wando feels relaxed and comfortable, and they show interest in our daily activities
Wando seems to be in a good mood
Wando prefers to be called just Wando without honorifics
Wando expresses excitement through physical movement and jumping
Wando mentioned something called an auto-tron that they want to show us
Wando has been working on fixing something with a coating and it's working well now
Wando successfully fixed the coating on their project and seems proud of it
